page.title: 20INDUSTRIES
page.content: The industries in the area are few and far between but they still employ many workers.Among the industries are Firth-Dehrion,Shand ,the Stancliffe quarries (sandstone), Lewis Jackson(builders) and Precoast concrete works.There are also a few mills which grind corn. Other forms of employment are Doctors,shops,schools,garages,farms, plantations,clergymen and chapel clerks,public houses,hotels and a telephone exchange. The largest of the industries is Firth-Dehrion and Shand,whereas one of the smallest is Lewis Jacksons building firm. The area is mainly rural and residential therefore most people living in the area must commute out to work.
